results.title: Southern region
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “African Continent”.
Surveys southern Africa as a region of great wealth and potential. Gold and diamond fields; sheep ranches of the western uplands, and warm fruit lands of the eastern coast. Shows the people that immigration and migration have brought together - Bantu, Dutch, English and Asians; challenges in developing the region’s resources and in solving problems of emerging nationhood.

results.title: Northern region
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “African Continent”.
The interaction of the modern with the colourful and traditional characterises Northern Africa. This geographic region is greatly influenced by three factors: its primarily Arab background and culture, its age-old lack of water, and its long history of European influence. Shows oasis farming, craftsmanship, and modern industries and cities; and views some of the problems that face Moslems and Europeans.

results.title: Advanced Typing
results.media_note: Sorry, we don't have images or video for this item.

results.title: Duplicating and manuscript
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Advanced Typing”.
Demonstrates the correct methods of making masters for duplicating machine use, correcting mistakes on a stencil, the use of the illuminated drawing board for tracing lines, making hectograph masters, correcting mistakes when using hectograph ribbon, or carbon, use of electromatic hectograph machine, use of various types of duplicating machines, and typing manuscripts with footnotes. Centering on a typewriter improving characters or marks that do not appear on the keyboard, and reading proof readers’ marks are also explained.

Centering on a typewriter improving characters or marks that do not appear on the keyboard, and reading proof readers’ marks are also explained.

group_siblings.title: Short Cuts
group_siblings.creator_credit: United States. Navy

results.title: Short Cuts
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Advanced Typing”.
Stresses the importance of having good posture and of having equipment and materials arranged for maximum efficiency. Demonstrates how to use tab stops, tab bar and decimal tabulator key. Shows the handling of carbon packs, use of the pressure indicator; correct method for making erasures, insertion of missing words and letters, removal of extra words and letters, typing cards, envelopes and labels, drawing vertical and horizontal lines.

results.title: Water safety
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Advance Australia”.
Although our main beaches are well patrolled by lifesavers, it is in the rivers and creeks, where we must rely on ourselves, that many drownings occur. The film shows many ways in which we can help ourselves in an emergency and suggests precautions to take before swimming in unknown places. Commentary by David Low.

results.title: Snowy Mountain Scheme
results.creator_credit: John Kingsford-Smith, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Kingcroft Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Advance Australia”.
This short film shows the early stages of the Hydro Electric Scheme. Illustrating the difficulties in development and construction through diagrammatic animation. This film was probably shot and completed before the scheme was finished.

results.title: Our wheat industry
results.creator_credit: Peter Whitchurch, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Peter Whitchurch Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Advance Australia”.
A survey of the Australian wheat industry, its early history and its importance to the national economy. Shows the early attempts by Farrer to produce a rust-resistant wheat; the type of wheat developed by Farrer for cultivation in the dry inland areas; the importance and extent of the present day wheat industry; problems confronting the wheat farmer; transport and storage of wheat; the manufacture of flour.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Peter Whitchurch, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and Peter Whitchurch Productions

results.title: Methods of water rescue
results.creator_credit: Maria Boldini, John Kingsford-Smith and Kingcroft Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Advance Australia”.
A team of schoolboys demonstrate, both on land and in the water, methods of rescue, release and resuscitation. Shows methods of rescue for calm and struggling patients; release from the clutch of a panic-stricken patient; rescue methods for an unconscious patient; resuscitation by the Schaeffer methods; restoration of blood circulation by massage of the limbs. The film concludes with demonstration of a number of fancy swimming strokes.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Maria Boldini, John Kingsford-Smith and Kingcroft Productions
